Package source_sink
[transport]

Source interface to be fulfilled by driver or application Specifically, the user must set the "source" pointer (a variable in this module) to a subroutine that meets the compute_source interface. More...


Data Types

interface  interface
 Calculate source. More...

Functions/Subroutines

subroutine no_source (source, conc, area, flow, ncell, nvar, time)
 Zero source implementation. This source term adds nothing (e.g., for conservative constituents).

Detailed Description

Source interface to be fulfilled by driver or application Specifically, the user must set the "source" pointer (a variable in this module) to a subroutine that meets the compute_source interface.

Function/Subroutine Documentation

subroutine source_sink.no_source ( real(stm_real),dimension(ncell,nvar),intent(inout)  source,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell,nvar),intent(in)  conc,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell),intent(in)  area,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell),intent(in)  flow,
integer,intent(in)  ncell,
integer,intent(in)  nvar,
real(stm_real),intent(in)  time 
)

Zero source implementation. This source term adds nothing (e.g., for conservative constituents).

Parameters:
source cell centered source
conc Concentration
area area at source
flow flow at source location
ncell Number of cells
nvar Number of variables
time time
